level.text: At the Commission’s request, the candidate shall execute all waivers and releases necessary for the Commission to secure tax information concerning him or her, including copies of tax returns.
The failure of a candidate to provide the waivers and releases required under ยง2034.1 may be considered by the Commission adversely to the candidate.
Copies of all records received from the taxing authorities shall be provided to the candidate.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 24 DCR 9391, 9412 (May 5, 1978); Final Rulemaking published at 37 DCR 6032, 6044 (September 14, 1990); and Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 9333, 9345 (December 11, 1992); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 108 (January 6, 2006); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 12322 (December 21, 2007).
